subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text: Beware to distinguish the regionally different forms of this character – {{lang|ja|戶}} (top stroke connects to left stroke) vs. {{lang|und|sc=Hani|戸}} (top stroke does not connect) and {{l|mul|户}}. Note the different stroke order: [[户]] and {{lang|und|sc=Hani|戸}} have 丿 as last (fourth) stroke, while 戶 (this page) has 丿 as second stroke.

subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text:
{{Han char|rn=63|rad=戶|as=00|sn=4|four=30277|canj=HS|ids=⿸𠂆コ}} <!-- Note: ⿱丿尸 is incorrect. -->
